You want to take your time with this process to get the color on evenly and to ensure your lip shape looks right.  Then wait for the color to dry (I usually wait 2-3 minutes) before using the gloss. Revlon's ColorStay Overtime Lip Color in Boundless Brandy has been my go-to lipstick for more than a decade. It's very true to color, goes on smoothly, never flakes off, and lasts all day. In fact, I once had a dentist ask me to remove my lipcolor, so he wouldn't smear it, and I'm not sure he believed me when I said it was impossible. The included gloss is something I don't often use -- I just don't like the feel of gloss in general. But it's nice to have if my lips are feeling a bit dry (rarely), or I want a bit of shine.

The Boundless Brandy color is absolutely perfect for me. The natural look doesn't really work for me, and this is one of the few colors I've found that isn't too much for wearing to work but also looks great when I dress up. If Revlon ever discontinues it, I may have to stop going out in public.

Then you'll go to a fancy company party with loads of mingling and you'll look amazing (you exfoliated and followed the directions, after all)...until 45 mins in and you're mid-girl talk with a coworkers wife and you just feel your lips drying up, cracking, dissolving into sticky goopy globs on your lips. You'll excuse yourself to the bathroom to find your lips are AWFUL. Cracked, goopy, terrible. You'll scrub vigorously to get what you can off and then reapply, because once you go bold you can't walk back out bare lipped. But you'll know full well no human on earth has the ability to reapply the gloss or chapstick every 5 minutes to keep this stuff looking okay, so you know you'll be back scrubbing and reapplying in 45 minutes. Then you'll check your teeth on the way home and see tons of the globs all over your teeth and die of embarrassment not knowing when those globs got on your teeth. Was it before or after you smiled wide while shmoozing all the higher ups? You will be miserable. You will be bummed. You will vow "never again". Do. Not. Buy. This.

review: Stays on so well you will need a purchased product to take it off! As someone who drinks coffee and water all day, this is the perfect product for me! There are some cons, however! How to remove: apply Vaseline, leave on for about five minutes, and then rub it off with something rough like a paper towel. It sometimes takes 2-3 times doing this to get it off completely. I recommend applying chapstick after removal. Removing this lip gloss will be tough for people with sensitive lips, and the gloss itself burns a bit on sensitive lips. Application is time consuming. It doesn't exactly go on evenly so it takes some patience to get it right. If too much is applied, it feels like glue, and will start peeling off. Try it for the first time on a day when you aren't in a rush or aren't going out so that you have time to get used to the process. Your lips will feel dry while it is on but will not appear dry. The back of the box says 15 hours of comfortable color no touch-ups needed even after meals....no way does this product live up to that promise!

name: Laura
review:
I have tried so many "long lasting" lipsticks, tests and/or purchasing the prestige brands. This lasted hours even through eating and drinking.
Unfortunately it is not true to color. It was much lighter than the packaging so I could barely tell I was wearing anything. After the 1 application, I will have to return to the store. I am willing to exchange and try another color as I tested another very well known prestige brand while in store and it was sticky, then found it to be coming off my lips and smudging by the time I left the store.

name: pugrads
review: I have used this lipstick in several different colors for several years.  Having bought everything from inexpensive to expensive brands that say they are 24 hr or generally long wearing - this is the ONLY one that is actually accurate.  Two coats will actually last through dinner & through the night if you don't take it off with makeup remover!  By far the best long wear lipstick in terms of staying power I've found.  Plus it's inexpensive (in terms of some lipsticks) & easily found at big box stores in a pinch.

name: Miss Elizabeth
review: First of all, I absolutely adore these lip colors! I have a bunch of the colors and they are the only ones I wear if I'm going out to eat or don't want to be touching up all day, because they don't come off while eating, are totally kiss-proof ;) and last all day! The only thing I will say is that they often look like a different color in the bottle than when they are on. My most recent new one is the relentless raisin, which is not as dark on, but is a beautiful purpley-burgundy shade. Totally recommend these!

name: Marge
review: I think the product has changed recently, seems to wear off much sooner. But I still use it and it gets me through an evening without having to re apply. I still have color after eating while others are putting lipstick on!

name: Lrtt8
review: The only lipstick that stays put without constant reapplication.  Freshen with gloss lasts all day.

name: spunky
review:
I am in my late 60's and this product does not "run" into lines around mouth. Stays on, in fact, I wake up with it on. Does not come off on
anything. Lips are not dry, and you can apply clear application anytime. I have 4 shades, and I love this lipstick.

name: Mel
review: I am ever on a quest for lipstick that wears well. Most long wear ones either wear off everywhere but the edge of my lips, leaving a liner effect that is not becoming or the ones that stay, end up flaky or dry. This one stayed all day, through washing my face before bed and even through the night of sleep.  I can use almost any lipgloss or lip protector over it without it wearing off. I bought a nude color to try but will be back for a more dramatic color (or two).

name: AleighLo
review: The color is great and the product is VERY long lasting. However, the color part dries my lips out a little and the gloss is extremely sticky. I would suggest only applying to moisturized lips and using a different gloss. Not sure if I would purchase this product again.

name: Elisheva
review: I have used this lipstick exclusively, since hearing about it a few years ago. It is amazing! It stays on all day. This is the only lipstick I have ever had to remove at the end of the day. I use "unlimited mulberry" because it is a great shade.

name: nana2six
review: Have used product but another color - not happy with this color selection.

name: Schmo
review: After eating, color still there.

name: meo
review: this is the best lipstick ever.  It lasts, looks so natural and the colors are great
